title: Exploring Cloud Native projects in CNCF Sandbox. Part 1: 13 arrivals of 2023 H1
author: Konstantin Nezhbert
description: New projects are joining CNCF and can surely help with your Cloud Native needs. Let’s discover Inspektor Gadget, Headlamp, Kepler, SlimToolkit, SOPS, Clusternet, Eraser, PipeCD, Microcks, kpt, Xline, HwameiStor, and KubeClipper!
sitename: Exploring Cloud Native projects in CNCF Sandbox. Part 1: 13 arrivals of 2023 H1 – Palark | Blog
cntitle: 探索 CNCF 沙盒中的云原生项目。第一部分：2023 年上半年 13 个新成员
cndescription: 新的项目正在加入 CNCF，并且可以肯定地帮助您满足云原生需求。让我们来了解 Inspektor Gadget、Headlamp、Kepler、SlimToolkit、SOPS、Clusternet、Eraser、PipeCD、Microcks、kpt、Xline、HwameiStor 和 KubeClipper！
